name: Mist Bubble
description:
The character cannot use Skills.
End Phase: Remove this status, deal 1 Hydro DMG to the character to which it is attached.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character cannot use Skills</color>.\nEnd Phase: Remove this status, deal 1 $[K102] to the character to which it is attached.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character cannot use Skills</color>.\nEnd Phase: Remove this status, deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> to the character to which it is attached.
